title: 29 Funny Feline Posts Purrfectly Documenting the Weird and Wonderful Creatures That are Cats
description: Happy Fursday, feline fam. We don't have to tell you how weird and wonderful cats are because you already know it. That's what makes cats so meowgical - they are these graceful, beautiful, sleek creatures….and also the derpiest things with four legs that walk on this Earth. They can be purrfectly perched on a windowsill looking like a gift from the heavens in all of their meowjestic beauty, and then you call their name, and they look at you with a face only a mother could love.Cats have the best qualities of us, combined with an accidental silliness that just makes the purrfect recipe for cuteness. They are quirky. They are weird. They are silly. They are gorgeous. They are soft. They are fluffy. They are the purrfect pets and companions. They are also our greatest source of entertainment, as well as the rulers of the internet. Please enjoy this kitty compilation of cats simply being cats because there is nothing better than a cat that embraces their own silly nature.
author: Blake Seidel
excerpt: 29 Funny Feline Posts Purrfectly Documenting the Weird and Wonderful Creatures That are Cats - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Happy Fursday, feline fam. We don't have to tell you how weird and wonderful cats are because you already know it. That's what makes cats so meowgical - they are these graceful, beautiful, sleek creatures….and also the derpiest things with four legs that walk on this Earth. They can be purrfectly perched on a windowsill looking like a gift from the heavens in all of their meowjestic beauty, and then you call their name, and they look at you with a face only a mother could love.

Cats have the best qualities of us, combined with an accidental silliness that just makes the purrfect recipe for cuteness. They are quirky. They are weird. They are silly. They are gorgeous. They are soft. They are fluffy. They are the purrfect pets and companions. They are also our greatest source of entertainment, as well as the rulers of the internet. Please enjoy this kitty compilation of cats simply being cats because there is nothing better than a cat that embraces their own silly nature.
